projects.name: Taloushallinto360
description: I built a website for our school's financial management students and teachers with a classmate.
The website is going to be a platform that brings together the paths of financial management studies
by using four case companies that have different financial management needs, and exercises for all courses to utilize.
The website is built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and uses a JSON file as a quick 'database' for easier updating.

projects.name: Karels Oy website
description: During my internship at IT-Palvelu Varaani, I fully designed, developed and built a website for a local company Karels Oy
The website was built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, and it is hosted on a server
All info on the site is translated into three languages and can be updated by the owner easily on the admin page I built.

projects.name: Wellness app with Angular
description: Built a Wellness tracking Web app with my classmate as a part of a project course.
It is a prototype front-end made with Angular, and would need more work to be fully functional.
I have since moved on to other projects so this is going to be left as a prototype.
